name: Cutthroats: Terror on the High Seas
name_original: Cutthroats: Terror on the High Seas
description:
Cutthroats: Terror on the High Seas is a strategy game developed by Hothouse Creations. It was originally released in 1999. Eidos Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Cutthroats: Terror on the High Seas on PC.
It was scored by Allister Brimble.
